description: Conformance vectors for evaluateEconomicBoundary() decision engine.

vectors.description: Both trust and capital pass — access granted
Both trust and capital fail — denied
All values exactly at threshold — granted
Budget values exceeding Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER — BigInt comparison
Integration: full EconomicBoundary with criteria — granted via evaluateFromBoundary()
Integration: full EconomicBoundary with criteria — denied with codes and gap
Integration: EconomicBoundary without criteria — denied via evaluateFromBoundary()
